channel.title: Epicurus Jarring Problem?
channel.description: I tried jarring it several times, I have jarred many servers as I do host servers. Although the Epicurus Client is a bit tricky... I can't seem to jar it... I place bin folder for the input and jar it then click the jar and this pops up "Java exception error" If anyone could help that would be great! Thank you.

item.title: Epicurus Jarring Problem?
item.dc:creator: @mewy123123 mewy123123
item.description:
@mewy123123 wrote:

I tried jarring it several times, I have jarred many servers as I do host servers. Although the Epicurus Client is a bit tricky…
I can’t seem to jar it… I place bin folder for the input and jar it then click the jar and this pops up "Java exception error"
If anyone could help that would be great! Thank you.
